thread.title: Nice, clean hotel in a great location - Review
thread.title_full: Nice, clean hotel in a great location - Review of Hotel Oceanic, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: juliapoplawski
title: Nice, clean hotel in a great location - Review
text: Very nice clean hotel. Rooms are spacious and beds are extremely comfortable. Clean and well kept. Good location close to shops and the Subway station. Breakfast could use a bit of help but is free so it is acceptable. Very nice staff .
